name: Authentic Thai Mango Salad Recipe
description: This traditional recipe for Thai mango salad comes together quickly. It's spicy, tangy, salty, and sweet.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dressing. In a large mixing bowl, combine palm sugar, dried chili flakes, fresh lime juice, and fish sauce. Mix and stir until the palm sugar is fully dissolved.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the dressing. In a large mixing bowl, combine palm sugar, dried chili flakes, fresh lime juice, and fish sauce. Mix and stir until the palm sugar is fully dissolved.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the remaining ingredients (shredded green mango, fish snacks, roasted peanuts, shallots, and optionally dried shrimp) to the mixing bowl and gently mix until all ingredients are coated with the dressing.
